=Intallation=
 
  * Extract *inc.zip* to *_`<`EPOC32`>`\include_*, then the headers can be found in *_`<`EPOC32`>`\include\html_*.

  * Extract *lib`_``<`PLATFORM`>`.zip* to *_`<`EPOC32`>`\release_*, then the static libs can be found in *_`<`EPOC32`>`\release\winscw\udeb\htmlcontrol.lib_* and *_`<`EPOC32`>`\release\armv5\urel\htmlcontrol.lib_* (or *_`<`EPOC32`>`\release\thumb\urel\htmlcontrol.lib_*).

  * Add the following statement to MMP file,
     {{{STATICLIBRARY htmlcontrol.lib}}}
  * Add the dependent libraries to MMP file. For S60 2nd Edition, they are:
     {{{
     LIBRARY bafl.lib eikdlg.lib eikcoctl.lib eikctl.lib
     LIBRARY gdi.lib fbscli.lib bitgdi.lib ws32.lib egul.lib 
     LIBRARY form.lib etext.lib uiklaf.lib
     LIBRARY aknskins.lib aknskinsrv.lib
     LIBRARY imageconversion.lib
     LIBRARY inetprotutil.lib
     }}}
    
  For S60 3rd Edition, they are:
     {{{
     LIBRARY bafl.lib eikdlg.lib eikcoctl.lib eikctl.lib
     LIBRARY gdi.lib fbscli.lib bitgdi.lib ws32.lib egul.lib 
     LIBRARY form.lib etext.lib uiklaf.lib
     LIBRARY aknskins.lib aknskinsrv.lib aknswallpaperutils.lib aknicon.lib
     LIBRARY imageconversion.lib
     LIBRARY inetprotutil.lib
     }}}
  For S60 5th Edition, they are:
     {{{
     LIBRARY bafl.lib eikdlg.lib eikcoctl.lib eikctl.lib
     LIBRARY gdi.lib fbscli.lib bitgdi.lib ws32.lib egul.lib 
     LIBRARY form.lib etext.lib uiklaf.lib
     LIBRARY aknskins.lib aknskinsrv.lib aknswallpaperutils.lib aknicon.lib
     LIBRARY imageconversion.lib
     LIBRARY inetprotutil.lib
     LIBRARY touchfeedback.lib
     }}}
  For UIQ3, they are:
     {{{
     LIBRARY bafl.lib eikdlg.lib eikcoctl.lib eikctl.lib
     LIBRARY gdi.lib fbscli.lib bitgdi.lib ws32.lib egul.lib 
     LIBRARY form.lib etext.lib uiklaf.lib
     LIBRARY skins.lib quiconfigclient.lib qikdlg.lib qikctl.lib
     LIBRARY imageconversion.lib
     LIBRARY inetprotutil.lib
     }}}
